title: Demonstration of how to wash our hands in wudu - Assim al hakeem
transcript: from india he says can you demonstrate washing the hands in wudhu you put water in the palm of your hand and or you put it in the right hand and you do this and as it drops down you just wash it that's it you can also put it in both hands and do this and it's going to drop so you just wipe this is washing washing and wiping with whatever is there this is once and that does the job inshallah he's asking
